item.title: XML, TEI, and the Digitization of Text
item.description: Introduction The summer after discovering Middle English and medieval studies, I was lucky to sit in a directed reading course focused on palaeography, or the study of old writing systems.

item.title: Digital Humanities to Industrialized Construction: The Evolution of an Idea
item.description: Let’s start with a term you may not be familiar with: Digital Humanities.

item.title: About Elias
item.description: Hey there! I’m Elias, a curious explorer typically found in the fields of construction, manufacturing, architecture, and design.
